name: Data Carrier
description:
Data Carrier is a short prototype of a platformer game, where you are a scientist trying to recover his data before a nuclear bomb explodes everything.

Average playtime: 5-10 minutes

Key features:
  • A short platformer experience 
  • Graphic settings
  • Two different environments : Laboratory and City
Controls:
  • WASD / ZQSD to move
  • Mouse to look around
  • E to pickup / exit
  • Ctrl to crouch
